name: I Flew on Singapore Airlines' Airbus A380!
description:
Back in May of 2022, I was in Frankfurt after crossing off a flight on Lufthansa's 747-400, and doing some spotting with my friend and fellow YouTube creator @JonathanWinton123!

While looking for flights home, I came across quite the Aeroplan redemption - FRA-JFK on Singapore Airlines' Airbus A380! It's been 8 years since I last flew on the "superjumbo", and this seemed like the perfect opportunity to revisit this enormous aircraft and see what Singapore Airlines was like!

Enjoy this unusual fifth freedom flight from Frankfurt to New York, on an Asian carrier!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Singapore Airlines (SIA/SQ)
Aircraft: Airbus A380-800 (A388)
Flight Number: SQ026
Seat: 63A/78A
Livery: Standard
Engines: 4x RR Trent 970
Registration: 9V-SKN
Route: Frankfurt (FRA) - New York (JFK)
Callsign: SINGAPORE 026 Super
Runway used: 25C (FRA) - 13L (JFK)
Date filmed: May 2022

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song - "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://youtu.be/bCTTwQ_269c
